beliefs: We live in an age of darkness. We must find the path that leads to the light.
Act with compassion and courage. Each noble act is a step on the path.
Hone your body and your mind. You are the tool you will use to change reality.
hierarchy: The individual follows the quori within the him/herself
Tribes of Kalashtar promote this faith

deities.desc: The hope of the next age - The great light
